tours.title: Five Star Cruise Dinner
tours.description: Experience a luxurious dinner cruise in Dubai Marina with stunning views and entertainment!
tours.description2: Enjoy a luxurious dinner cruise experience in Dubai Marina! This premium package includes a 2-hour cruise through Dubai Marina, Yatch Club, and Marina Towers. The cruise features both air-conditioned lower deck and open-air upper deck access, offering panoramic views of the Dubai Marina skyline.

inclusions.pickup: Pick up from your Apartment, Hotel, Residence
inclusions.cruise: 2 Hours Cruising in Dubai Marina, Yatch Club, Marina Towers
inclusions.deck: Access to Air Conditioned Lower Deck and Open Air Upper Deck
inclusions.food: Arabic Sweets & Fresh Fruits, Selection of fresh Fruit Salads and Tasty Desserts
inclusions.dinner: Buffet Dinner Catered by a 5* Hotel for both veg and non-veg diets
inclusions.entertainment: Tanura Dance Show by Professional Artist, Family Entertainment

tours.title: Luxury Yacht Cruising
tours.description: Experience the ultimate luxury with a private yacht cruise in Dubai Marina!
tours.description2: Indulge in a premium yacht cruising experience in Dubai Marina! This exclusive package includes a 2-hour cruise in the marina lagoon with professional crew services. The package can be extended for additional hours at extra charges.

inclusions.crew: Professional crew with the services of skipper, fishing equipment, safety jacket, and light refreshments
inclusions.extension: Hours can be extended at extra charges
